name: lity
title: Lity
description: Lity is a lightweight responsive lightbox plugin that allows for any and/or all images on your site open in a lightbox.
author: Evan Herman

scripts.build: yarn min && rm -rf build/* && rsync -av --mkpath --exclude-from .distignore --delete . build/lity/ && cd build/ && zip -r lity.zip lity/.
